meetingInfo.name: Biweekly
meetingInfo.purpose: Structuring Ambassador rules around payments, tasks and anything related to financial activities

workingDocs.title: Some possible approaches to budget fitting
Context setting for Core Contributor decision on Q4 budgets

discussionPoints: Should we move to fixed AGIX rewards?
What are the upsides and downsides of fixed AGIX rewards?
How do we approach planning the next Quarter's Treasury Guild Sessions?
What are the main topics of the next Quarter's Treasury Guild Sessions?
Who should be responsible for Q1 Meeting preparations?

decisionItems.decision: Treasury Guild will move to fixed AGIX Ratio rewards in Quarter 1
Microsoft License costs (up to 3) will be taken from the support activity budget line
Notice! In Quarter 2, The Treasury Operators start to meet bi-weekly
Continue using the Meeting Summary rotation model that we started to experiment in Q4
Tevo can continue supporting the Meeting Preparations and coordination
The Ambassador Program Q1 Budgets are decided and approved.

actionItems.text: Effiom to include hours to Dework Tasks
Check up with Onize to learn how much she spent on drafting Treasury Proposal
Tevo to draft meeting Summary and upload in summary tool.
Vani to review and publish in Discord
Tevo to update Core Contributors in Discord
Tevo to update Treasury Manager Configuration to automatically calculate AGIX rewards based on task points
Andre to update Quarter 1 2025 Budgets on Dashboard

discussionPoints: How are reserves calculated? What is “Program reserves” and what is “WG reserves”?
Do WorkGroup reserves get clawed back? - before 2023 it was done automatically and currently nothing in place for this
How long should we wait for workgroups to use the leftover funds each WG is collecting? Should there even be a time limit?
How flexible should budgets be - can WGs reallocate unspent funds to activities they need to do?
Do reserves get clawed back, and if so, how and when? How should this be decided? e.g. a consent process to all Core Contributors?

actionItems.text: Coordinate with Treasury Automation WG to improve calculations of reserves and have better overview of it in the dashboard.
Discuss the use of reserves in the next Town Hall on 7th Jan 2025, and in Governance WG; ensure everyone understands the current situation before asking for opinions on changing it

tags.topicsCovered: Quarter 1, Reporting, Quarter 2, Proposal, Budget , Guild Management, Documentation, treasury guild operations, Automation, Miro Board, Reserve, Fixed AGIX Rewards, Rewards
